name: a Void That
description:
Content Warning: psychological horror, sensitive topics (death, accidents, …), disturbing music. 

a short first person horror visual novel about two people, a walk and something unexpressed.

a game with two different endings by fintopiccante [fintopiccante.itch.io]:
story, sound and other stuff by illud [illud.itch.io]
original ink drawings and graphics by Gioskro [gioskro.itch.io]

made during the Interactive Story Jam 2 - #Spinoffevent2

Spinoff link
